name: VR multiplayer shooter
description:
development build of a project i am currently working on. Its a VR multiplayer shooter meant to be run on a quest 2. This is a development verison of the game so its still lacking alot of features and has alot of bugs. 

The game is based on a udemy course i follow for multiplayer. The course ended once multiplayer was implemented and im now working to add guns to the game.
